episodes.title: My Parents Indoctrinated Me…with Scientology - Kelli Copter | Heretics podcast 11
episodes.description:
This is one of the strangest and scariest stories I've ever heard, and gives us an insight into the way kids can be brainwashed and made to feel there is something wrong with them. Kelli Copter was born into a scientology family in the north of England. Her first years as part of the Tom Cruise Hollywood cult (which also has John Travolta and is run by David Miscavige) were absolute hell. She's an absolute heretic, and broke free. #scientology #kellicopter #tomcruise 

Follow Kelli's amazing channel:  @KelliCopter  

Andrew Links:
http://instagram.com/andrewgold_ok
http://twitter.com/andrewgold_ok
https://www.patreon.com/andrewgold

18:40 Scientology in Manchester, UK
21:00 INSANE way they involved her in fights
24:20 Sauna Torture

34:45 Pulling her hair out
36:00 UK Scientology School & Tom Cruise' Dyslexia

40:00 How abuse changed her
